moreBlocks.lawyersAtPeterThompson&AssociatesSelecte: • Thompson, Peter On a Super Lawyers® List

description:
Voted Portland's "Best Personal Injury Lawyers" 10 years in a row.

Peter Thompson & Associates' attorneys have over 60 years combined experience specializing in serious accident and injury cases and were awarded U.S. News & World Report's "Best Law Firms" rating. Last year alone we recovered over $15,000,000 for our clients and-just as important-were rated 4.9 out of 5 stars by our clients for "overall satisfaction" with 100 percent stating they "would recommend" our firm to others.

Serving clients throughout the state from our six office locations, including our law office in Portland, the award-winning attorneys at our law firm have achieved unprecedented success advocating on behalf of individuals who were seriously injured due to

• Car, truck and motorcycle accidents
• Bicycle and pedestrian accidents
• Medical malpractice and nursing home abuse
• Dangerous property conditions such as rotten decks, poorly constructed/maintained stairs, untreated ice, and other hazardous conditions.
• Traumatic brain injuries

Unmatched Service And Support

Utilizing a vast network of professional resources, such as private investigators, medical consultants and others industry experts, we work to build the strongest case possible to help you achieve the justice you seek. As veterans of more than 100 jury trials, we know what it takes to make a winning argument on your behalf, and our law firm has achieved a success rate of over 98 percent.

If you have been seriously injured in an accident and are looking for a law firm you can trust to protect your rights and interests, call Peter Thompson & Associates. There is no charge to speak to us and there is no fee unless you win.
